name: Dream Dragon a.k.a. A dream I had on Monday the 28th of October at 5:45 AM
name_original: Dream Dragon a.k.a. A dream I had on Monday the 28th of October at 5:45 AM
description:
This game is a VERY close approximation to a dream I had about a fictional video game on the 28th of October at 5:45 AM. It was incredibly vivid and the second I woke up from it I realised that there was no aspect of it that I wouldn't be able to make, so I decided to make it for the hell of it. It will only take you under two minutes to complete. Sound is required.

Thanks to Jack for helping with Blender related business: https://claufiersoft.itch.io/hendecad

There is one image credit required which I will post here. Don't look at it before the game or it will spoil it for you: https://www.flickr.com/photos/dfmagazine/5730870545/

Follow my Twitter for more fun creations and streams and shit: https://twitter.com/lime_lemon

I plan on posting some of the game assets on Twitter so keep an eye out.
